CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Date_Time_Reopened__c), IF( ISBLANK(ClosedDate), ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 24, 2), ROUND((ClosedDate - CreatedDate) * 24, 2) ), IF( ISBLANK(ClosedDate), ROUND((NOW() - Date_Time_Reopened__c) * 24, 2), ROUND((ClosedDate - Date_Time_Reopened__c) * 24, 2) ) )
CustomField.label: Case Duration Since Open/Reopen (Hours)
